name: NIGHT SEA HOTEL
address: 124 Đường Trần Hưng Đạo, Duong To, Phú Quốc, Việt Nam
description:
Nằm ở Phú Quốc, cách Bãi Dinh Cậu 2.9 km, NIGHT SEA HOTEL cung cấp chỗ nghỉ có hồ bơi ngoài trời, chỗ đậu xe riêng miễn phí, trung tâm thể dục và khu vườn. Mỗi phòng tại khách sạn 4 sao này đều nhìn ra thành phố, đồng thời khách có thể sử dụng sân hiên và quầy bar. Chỗ nghỉ cung cấp lễ tân 24/24, dịch vụ đưa đón sân bay, dịch vụ phòng và Wi-Fi miễn phí.

Khách sạn sẽ cung cấp cho khách các phòng được trang bị điều hòa có bàn làm việc, ấm đun nước, minibar, két an toàn, TV màn hình phẳng và phòng tắm riêng với vòi xịt/chậu rửa vệ sinh. Tại NIGHT SEA HOTEL, các phòng đều đi kèm với ga trải giường và khăn tắm.

Chỗ nghỉ có phục vụ bữa sáng thực đơn buffet, kiểu lục địa hoặc kiểu Ý mỗi buổi sáng. Tại chỗ nghỉ, khách sẽ tìm thấy nhà hàng phục vụ ẩm thực Mỹ, Anh và Pháp. Bên cạnh đó, họ có thể yêu cầu món chay, không chứa sữa và món thuần chay.

NIGHT SEA HOTEL cách Chùa Sùng Hưng 3 km và Công viên giải trí Vinpearl Land Phú Quốc 25 km. Sân bay gần nhất là Sân bay Quốc tế Phú Quốc, cách khách sạn 3 km.

review.comment_positive: Location, room size and facilities, breakfast, tour, rooms cleaned and towels changed every day, water bottles, coffee and tea provided every day, comfortable bed and pillows, proper shower pressure and hot water. Lots of restaurants around and two well-stocked supermarkets with reasonable prices. I would recommend staying here.
review.comment_negative:
The pool doesn’t have any shade and there was one hair in the shower when we arrived but other than that everything was very clean and was cleaned every day. 

Unfortunately, the closest beach (5min walk) is not particularly nice - the water is dirty and sewage pipes can be seen on the beach. We went to explore other beaches around the island which are cleaner.

review.comment_positive:
Отель расположен удобно по отношению к морю ,и к городу. Своего пляжа нет,но достаточно много места на городском пляже с платными шезлонгами и можно пройти дальше и на диком пляже загорать. На центральной улице много кафе,большой продуктовый магазин. В настоящее время ходит из аэропорта бесплатный 17 автобус,он останавливаться недалеко от отеля и на нам можно доехать до Grand worlds.
Номер просторный,с балкона вид на море. TV- smart.
review.comment_negative: Во многих отелях Вьетнама очень скромные завтраки. Этот отель не исключение. На мой взгляд,кто с детьми,им есть нечего. Взрослым-яичница:)

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Giường Đôi
review.comment_positive: Personál hotelu byl velice příjemný a vstřícný. Blízko centra a pláže. Pokoj byl čistý, úklid pokoje byl na jedničku.
review.comment_negative: Skromná nabídka snídaní, snídaně nenadchnula a ani neurazila. Nikde nebyla napsaná možnost, že nám můžou udělat i vajíčka, zjistili jsme až po tom, co jsme se sami zeptali personálu v kuchyni. Vybavení bylo celkem pěkné, ale šlo vidět, že je například koberec v chodbách hotelu zastaralý a opotřebovaný. Bazén hotelu byl mírně znečištěn, plavali v něm nečistoty, ale ne tak, že by se v něm nedalo koupat. Byla jsem trochu v rozpacích a nevěděla jsem, zda má hotel 3* nebo 4*, někde jsou uvedené 3* a někde zase 4*. Pokud je hotel 4*, tak 4* hotelu neodpovídají.

review.rating: Unhelpful scammy staff, broken toilets, sinks, showers.
review.room_type: Phòng Superior Giường Đôi
review.comment_positive: The only pros of this hotel is that it is downtown and close to restaurants and the beach.
review.comment_negative: we had a horrible experience with the staff, bookings, and quality of the rooms and stay. The toilet in our room has a small hole at the base of it, so when you flush the toilet, it pushes out some of what was flushed on to the bathroom floor. We're on the 10th floor, and at 5 am they started doing maintenance or maybe vacuuming on the 11th floor. One of my friends was first assigned a room that smelled like someone smoked a chimney inside the room. Her replacement room does not have a working sink. Our other friends booked a luxury ocean view room, and upon check in, were told none were available. The staff tried to give them a much cheaper room while charging them the original price, which is almost double the price of the cheaper room. When booking through booking.com or Agoda, they never seem to communicate or organize enough to have the reserved rooms actually available when the customers check in. The last person in our group booked 4 rooms for his relatives, and was told they only had 2 available. Lastly, their currency exchange service is a scam. They offered 23K dong per USD, when you can walk 5 min down the street to a currency exchange or to another hotel and get 24K.

review.comment_positive: I am truly impressed by the outstanding service provided by this hotel. Despite booking at a cheaper rate, the level of care and attention to detail exceeded my expectations. During our stay, we unfortunately left behind a backpack at the hotel while departing for another city, Nha Trang. However, the hotel staff went above and beyond by promptly sending the parcel to our new location at their own expense. This act of kindness and exceptional service truly deserves recognition. I wholeheartedly recommend this hotel to everyone for its remarkable commitment to customer satisfaction. Thank you very much for making our stay memorable and for your exceptional service.

review.rating: Atención personal excelente. Hotel con muy buena relación calidad-precio
review.room_type: Phòng Superior Giường Đôi
review.comment_positive: Desayuno buffet EXCELENTE, muy variado, de buena calidad y se adaptaron a género vegetariano y gluten free. Por supuesto la amabilidad del personal en especial Yến de recepción, Trân el chef y Thuc la camarera del desayuno, atentos de todo en todo momento y siempre con una sonrisa sincera. La limpieza de la habitación es estupenda, la comodidad de la cama perfecta, la habitación sin ruidos y con cortinas que consiguen que no pase la luz. La piscina tiene muy buenas vistas. Buena ubicación, está cerca de supermercados y restaurantes al igual que de la playa.
review.comment_negative: Por decir algo, la piscina necesita más mantenimiento de limpieza en los fondos (suelo) y el gimnasio necesita algo más de mancuernas, limpieza y que repongan el agua (se ve que no es una zona a la que le presten demasiada atención)

The hotel was not very well clean. The carpet going to the room was extremely dirty full of stains. In the first night we got a lot of noise from the building however, they moved us to another room.

review.rating: Fijn hotel, het team is behulpzaam
review.room_type: Phòng Superior Giường Đôi
review.comment_positive:
Een perfect schone kamer. 
Mooie wijdse uitzicht. 
Een professioneel team. Kun je merken dat de mensen hier van hun werk houden. Ze zijn heel behulpzaam: het receptie, een schoonmaak team, het restaurant. 🌸

Wij zijn in 61 accommodaties binnen 9 maanden verbleven. Maar deze wint de prijs qua het schoonmaak!
Elke dag wordt vloer gedweild,  witte schone lakkens, witte handdoeken zijn aangeboden. 

De locatie is ook goed: centraal en dicht bij het strand. 

De mensen van het hotel doen álles om je verblijf aangenaam te maken. 
Bedankt!💜

review.rating: Das Hotel und vorallem das Personal und der Pool sind super! Private/gesäuberte Strände toll! Müllproblem an allen ö
review.room_type: Suite Nhìn Ra Biển
review.comment_positive: Das Personal ist super freundlich und hilfsbereit. Die Abwicklung von Zusatzdiensten (Motorroller ausleihen) lief problemlos und kostete genauso viel/wenig wie in den Verleihshops in der Stadt. Man kann die Insel aber auch mit den kostenlosen VINBUS erkunden. Diese pendeln in 10-20 Minuten-Takt. Einfach die VINBUS-App herunterladen und sich die Strecken und Haltestellen anschauen. Die Zimmer waren sauber und die Betten gemütlich. Die Zimmer wurden täglich gereinigt. Das Frühstück war super. Es war ein Mix aus vietnamesischen und europäischen Essen. Zudem hat ein Koch frisch Rührei / Spiegelei / Omelett oder Suppe zubereitet! Der Kaffee ist super lecker!
review.comment_negative:
Eine Dusche direkt am Pool und ein Sonnensegel / Markise auf der Dachterrasse wären toll gewesen.

Der Strand ist fußläufig ca 120 Meter entfernt. Man kann dort gegen Aufpreis Liegen mieten oder in einer Bar einkehren.

Was uns wirklich erschrocken hat ist der Müll an den öffentlichen Stränden. Sowohl im Wasser als auch am Strand sammeln sich unzählige Plastiktüten, Verpackungen etc. Die Strandabschnitte, die von Hotels oder Bars genutzt werden sind aber gesäubert. Wir können nicht verstehen, wie man eine so traumhafte Insel durch den Müll, der überall scheinbar einfach ins Meer geworfen wird, ruinieren kann!!! Wir hoffen, dass man dieses Müllproblem, das in vielen Teilen von Vietnam zu beobachten ist, irgendwann in den Griff bekommt!

review.comment_positive: Lage nahe Strand, gute Infrastruktur, da viele Bars, Restaurants, Supermärkte etc. fußläufig. Rooftop-Swimmingpool mit tollem Panorama. Kostenfreier Shuttle bei Ankunft. Mail-Korrespondenz via booking.com lief stets zuverlässig ab.
review.comment_negative:
Liegen am Pool aus Stahl ohne Polster. Obwohl ich meine Yogamatte und 2 Handtücher darauf legte, war es zu hart und unbequem, als dass man länger hätte liegen können. Auch fehlen unter der prallen Sonne Schattenmöglichkeiten oder Schirme. 
Bei gewissen Dingen fehlt das Auge für‘s Detail (z. B. lässt sich Duschkabine nicht richtig schließen, Kaffeespuren an der Wand o. ä.). 
Da kaum oder nicht von allen halbwegs Englisch gesprochen wird, Verständigung mit Rezeption teils mühselig.
Nachdem ich anfangs zufrieden war, verlängerte ich um 2 Nächte. An selbigem Tag reiste eine große Gruppe einheimischer Touristen an. Es war sehr laut, da sie sich oft im Flur aufhielten, lautstark Unterhaltungen führten usw. Dann sprangen auch noch 15-20 Jugendliche spritzend und feiernd eines abends in den Pool, so dass die anderen 2-3 Gäste den Poolbereich kaum nutzen konnten. Alles war naß, selbst Lift und Flur. Nachdem ich das an der Rezeption erwähnte, bot man mir an, in eine andere Etage umzuziehen. War mir für die letzte Nacht zu aufwändig u. hätte nichts gebracht, weil die Beeinträchtigung auf allen Etagen spürbar war,

review.rating: Super belle hotel pres de la plage et coin plus tranquille.
review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn Nhìn Ra Biển
review.comment_positive: Super belle chambre avec eau chaude. Nous avions vu sur mer. Le balcon est de coté à la mer mais c’est bien. Le déjeuner est super gros. Plusieurs choix de repas en plus d’un bar à omelette et soupe pho chaque jour. A 5 min de la plage. Nous avons pris un scooter pour pouvoir aller au night market plus facilement. La plage est sale comme partout dans le coin donc avec le scooter nous sommes allés à des plages plus au sud que je recommande. (Khem Beach). Nous avons des serviettes de plage et des serviettes de douche à chaque jour.
review.comment_negative:
Le personnel parle très peu anglais mais nous salue à chaque fois. Les communications avec l’hotel sont donc difficile et lorsqu’on écrit au responsable, on a des réponses parfois un à deux jours plus tard. Le garcon de l’accueil nous a chargé une demi journée de scooter pour avoir ramené le scooter 1h en retard alors qu’on ne savait pas l’heure de retour prévue. Alors n’oubliez pas de le demander. J’ai écris au responsable qui m’a répondu 24h plus tard pour m’offrir un remboursement au moins et qui m’a dit que c’était une erreur mais malheureusement nous avions déjà quitté. 
La piscine n’est plus comme sur les photos puisqu’il y a un gros hotel devant.

review.rating: Great location but very poor standard of accommodation.
review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn Nhìn Ra Vườn
review.comment_positive:
Location and the view from the room. 
That's about it.
review.comment_negative:
Was there for 3 days.Nobody cleaned our room once.house keeping would arrive at 9 or 10am and ask to clean before we left or were even awake and then never return despite our requests for fresh towels and water. 

Having asked reception numerous times for towels they still didn't arrive so just gave up.
The staff were practically hopeless and more interested in taking our money than doing their actual jobs on a basic level.

The room looked tired and old like the rest of the hotel. The photos do not reflect the condition. 
We had a delux room with a stunning view on the 9th floor but unfortunately we both felt that the price was not competitive considering a beachfront bungalow was cheaper.

No bar or even mention of what the hotel offered by the staff on arrival. Most every time we met them they were more occupied by their phone or were asleep at reception on the couch.

This being my third time in Phu Quoc ,I feel this hotel does not in any way reflect  Vietnamese hospitality and certainly not the quality of accommodation I've come expect for the price.

There's more issues I could mention like the broken shower, TV channels, lack of a second key card, no hot water lack of room lighting or decent room furniture, no room service  but it was pointless mentioning these to staff as they wouldn't get seen to. 

I couldn't recommend this hotel to anyone with it's current standards and lazy staff. Very poor indeed.

review.comment_positive: The hotel was very nice, clean, good locations, and we had an awesome view from our room. We arrived early and we got to check in early, with no extra fee, we had no issues whatsoever at our arrival, which is not to take for granted in Vietnam. The staff was exceptionally kind and helpful. Just to say, I was at the pool to get some pictures of the beautiful sunset and suddenly my slippers disappeared...the staff managed to get them back the day after, avoiding me to go and buy a new pair. Overall my experience at the hotel was lovely and I'm just sad I couldn't spend more time there.
